name: Another Hardest Game: PATCH Origins
description:
Welcome to the fascinating world of "Another Hardest Game," where you control a small ball-shaped robot, eager to break free from a mysterious place. Challenges and unforgettable experiences await you!

🎮 Universal controls:

Feel the freedom to choose between a gamepad, keyboard, or mouse. Additionally, a special one-handed mode enables control like never before!

🎶 Retro nostalgia:

Discover magical music and sounds inspired by the '90s, Amiga, and C64, transporting you back to the golden era of retro gaming.

🌐 93 languages:

Immerse yourself in the world of Another Hardest Game in one of 93 languages, ensuring complete understanding for players worldwide.

🏆 Steam Leaderboards and achievements:

Compete with other players on Steam Leaderboards and earn unique achievements, showcasing your skills.

🎯 100 levels of challenges:

Experience thrilling challenges across over 100 levels, diverse in difficulty and creativity.

⏱️ Hours of entertainment:

Play for hours at a reasonable price, deriving joy from endless fun and exploration.

🗺️ Choose any level:

Decide which path to take by selecting any level at any moment.

🤚 One-Handed gameplay:

Thanks to an innovative one-handed control system, everyone can enjoy the adventure of Another Hardest Game, regardless of their skills.

💾 Auto-save and configurations:

Save time and focus on gameplay with the game's auto-save feature, and personalized settings that adapt the game to your preferences.

💻 Fantastic game performance:

Experience smooth and efficient game performance, fully immersing yourself in the world of Another Hardest Game.

🛒 Now available on Steam - Buy today!

Prepare for an exciting journey with Another Hardest Game. Can you conquer all the challenges and escape from the mysterious place? It's up to you!
